summary: Adds a female only UNP based armor, found near Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
Adds some \'mysterious\' runed armor to a coffin near Markarth. It can also be crafted with some leather and an iron ingot, should be available immediately. It\'s made from existing skyrim assets, and is rather simple. 
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26963-1-1353070684.jpg[/img]

The \'Active\' ones that you find have an enchant that increases all combat/active skill by 10% and magicka regen by 15%.

Available for slim and regular UNP. 

[b]Know issue[/b]
Clipping on the legs while running, shoulder clipping on weapon sheathing. Only clipping I spotted.
I\'ll work to improve upon the clipping.


So do the rune mean anything? Yes, they\'re actual words, as to what they say, most of it was just made up. For example, the robe says \"Clipping Inevitable.\"
author: nouserhere
